data.comment: Tambov kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Ball safe as Spartak Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 1, Tambov have a goal kick.
Can Tambov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half?
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 4, Ball goes out of play for a Tambov goal kick.
Throw-in for Tambov in the half of Spartak Moscow.
Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 6, Free kick Spartak Moscow.
Zelimkhan Bakaev (Spartak Moscow) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
In the minute 7, Spartak Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Spartak Moscow pushes forward through Jordan Larsson, whose finish on goal is saved.
Stanislav Vasilev awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Tambov to take a throw-in in Spartak Moscow territory.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a Tambov throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half.
In the minute 12, Corner awarded to Tambov.
Throw-in Spartak Moscow.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 13, Tambov to take a throw-in in Spartak Moscow territory.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Can Tambov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half?
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Spartak Moscow at Otkritie Arena.
Tambov awarded a throw-in in their own half.
German Onugha for Tambov drives towards goal at Otkritie Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 16, Throw-in Spartak Moscow.
Throw-in for Tambov at Otkritie Arena.
In the minute 19, Stanislav Vasilev awards the home team a throw-in.
Attention is being given to Spartak Moscowâ€™s Samuel Gigot and play has been suspended briefly.
Ball safe as Tambov is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Tambov in their own half.
Spartak Moscow drive upfield and Victor Moses gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Tambov defender.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow close to the penalty box.
In the minute 24, Goal kick for Tambov at Otkritie Arena.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in the half of Tambov.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 27, Spartak Moscow take a 1-0 lead thanks to Jordan Larsson.
That's a fine assist from Alex Kral.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
In the minute 31, Stanislav Vasilev signals a Spartak Moscow throw-in in Tambov's half.
Spartak Moscow to take a throw-in in Tambov territory.
Tambov needs to be cautious. Spartak Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 32, Can Spartak Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tambov's half?
Throw-in for Tambov in the half of Spartak Moscow.
Stanislav Vasilev blows against Tambov's Aleksandre Karapetian for offside.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Tambov at Otkritie Arena.
Can Tambov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half?
Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Tambov in the half of Spartak Moscow.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Tambov.
Tambov have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
In the minute 36, German Onugha's header is off-target for Tambov.
Stanislav Vasilev awards Spartak Moscow a goal kick.
Throw-in Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 41, Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a Spartak Moscow throw-in in Tambov's half.
Spartak Moscow's Alex Kral is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 42, Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow just outside Tambov's area.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
In the minute 44, Ball safe as Tambov is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Moscow, Ezequiel Ponce (Spartak Moscow) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
German Onugha (Tambov) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Tambov are coming forward and Vladimir Kabakhidze gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 45, Spartak Moscow have a goal kick.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Stanislav Vasilev awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second half is underway in Moscow - Spartak Moscow with the kick-off.
Jordan Larsson gets his shot on target but fails to score for Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 47, Spartak Moscow's Ezequiel Ponce breaks free at Otkritie Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Tambov at Otkritie Arena.
Free kick Tambov.
In the minute 49, Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
In the minute 53, Ezequiel Ponce (Spartak Moscow) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Tambov in Moscow.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 55, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Varazdat Haroyan of Tambov gets in a strike, but is off target.
Stanislav Vasilev awards Spartak Moscow a goal kick.
In the minute 56, Stanislav Vasilev signals a Spartak Moscow throw-in in Tambov's half.
Tambov awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Tambov in their own half.
In the minute 57, Aleksandre Karapetian for the away team is judged to be offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jordan Larsson (Spartak Moscow) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 59, Ball goes out of play for a Tambov goal kick.
Throw-in for Tambov in their own half.
In the minute 61, Can Tambov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half?
Jordan Larsson of Spartak Moscow smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
It's now 2-0 in Moscow as Ezequiel Ponce scores for Spartak Moscow.
Tambov's Aleksandre Karapetian is whistled for offside at Otkritie Arena.
Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 65, Goal! Tambov reduce the deficit to 2-1 through German Onugha.
Great play from Dmitrii Merenchukov to set up the goal.
In the minute 66, Stanislav Vasilev awards the home team a throw-in.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
Throw-in for Tambov in the half of Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 68, Tambov have a dangerous throw-in.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a throw-in for Tambov, close to Spartak Moscow's area.
Tambov drives forward and German Onugha gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Tambov.
Sebastien Thill of Tambov smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Tambov have a goal kick.
In the minute 73, Spartak Moscow's Ayrton Lucas gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
Throw-in Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 74, Tambov have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Tambov close to the penalty box.
Goal kick for Spartak Moscow at Otkritie Arena.
In the minute 75, Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Tambov.
Spartak Moscow to take a throw-in in Tambov territory.
In Moscow, Jordan Larsson of Spartak Moscow is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 78, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Spartak Moscow close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in the half of Tambov.
Can Spartak Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tambov's half?
In the minute 81, Spartak Moscow's Alex Kral gets in a shot on goal at Otkritie Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
Spartak Moscow's Ezequiel Ponce gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Tambov defender.
In the minute 82, Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
Goal! Spartak Moscow extend their lead to 3-1 through Jordan Larsson.
Ayrton Lucas instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 83, At Otkritie Arena, Nikita Chicherin has been yellow-carded for the away team.
The home team replace Victor Moses with Andrey Eshchenko.
Ilya Kutepov is on a sub for Jordan Larsson for Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 86, Tambov awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sergey Pervushin is making the team's first substitution at Otkritie Arena with Anwan Lawrence replacing Dmitrii Merenchukov.
In the minute 87, Samuel Gigot puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 4-1.
Free kick for Tambov in the half of Spartak Moscow.
Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Moscow.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow at Otkritie Arena.
Full-time! The final score is 5-1.
Domenico Tedesco (Spartak Moscow) is making a third substitution, with Dmitry Markitesov replacing Nail Umyarov.
Goal! Ezequiel Ponce extends Spartak Moscow's lead to 5-1.
Zelimkhan Bakaev with an assist there.
Ruslan Litvinov is replacing Alex Kral for Spartak Moscow at Otkritie Arena.
The home team have replaced Zelimkhan Bakaev with Oston Urunov. This is the fifth substitution made today by Domenico Tedesco.
